trans-unit.source: about_InlineScript
trans-unit.target: about_InlineScript

trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: About InlineScript
trans-unit.target: 關於 InlineScript

trans-unit.source: about_InlineScript
trans-unit.target: about_InlineScript

trans-unit.source: TOPIC
trans-unit.target: 主題

trans-unit.source: about_InlineScript
trans-unit.target: about_InlineScript

trans-unit.source: SHORT DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 簡短描述

trans-unit.source: Describes the InlineScript activity, which runs Windows PowerShell commands in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 描述 InlineScript 活動，工作流程中執行 Windows PowerShell 命令。

trans-unit.source: LONG DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: The InlineScript activity runs commands in a shared Windows PowerShell session in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: InlineScript 活動在工作流程中共用的 Windows PowerShell 工作階段中執行命令。

trans-unit.source: This activity is valid only in workflows.
trans-unit.target: 這個活動是在工作流程中才有效。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: InlineScript {<script block>}
trans-unit.target: InlineScript {<script block>}

trans-unit.source: DETAILED DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 詳細描述

trans-unit.source: The InlineScript activity runs commands in a shared Windows PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: InlineScript 活動會共用的 Windows PowerShell 工作階段中執行命令。

trans-unit.source: You can include it in a workflow to run commands that share data and commands that are not otherwise valid in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 您可以包含在工作流程來執行共用資料的命令和工作流程中無效的命令。

trans-unit.source: The InlineScript script block can include all valid Windows PowerShell commands and expressions.
trans-unit.target: InlineScript 指令碼區塊可以包含所有有效的 Windows PowerShell 命令和運算式。

trans-unit.source: Because the commands and expressions in an InlineScript script block run in the same session, they share all state and data, including imported modules and the values of variables.
trans-unit.target: 相同的工作階段中執行的命令與 InlineScript 指令碼區塊中的運算式，因為它們會共用所有狀態和資料，包括匯入的模組和變數的值。

trans-unit.source: You can place an InlineScript activity anywhere in a workflow or nested workflow, including inside a loop or control statement or a Parallel or Sequence script block.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在工作流程或巢狀工作流程，包括迴圈或控制陳述式或 Parallel 或 Sequence 指令碼區塊內的任意位置放置 InlineScript 活動。

trans-unit.source: The InlineScript activity has the activity common parameters, including PSPersist.
trans-unit.target: InlineScript 活動有活動一般參數，包括 PSPersist。

trans-unit.source: However, the commands and expressions in an InlineScript script block do not have the workflow features such as checkpointing ("persistence) and workflow or activity common parameters.
trans-unit.target: 不過，命令和 InlineScript 指令碼區塊中的運算式不需要的工作流程功能，例如檢查點 （「 持續性） 和工作流程或活動一般參數。

trans-unit.source: VARIABLES IN INLINESCRIPT
trans-unit.target: 變數在 INLINESCRIPT

trans-unit.source: By default, the variables that are defined in a workflow are not visible to the commands in the InlineScript script block.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設值，InlineScript 指令碼區塊中的命令看不到工作流程中定義的變數。

trans-unit.source: To make workflow variables visible to the InlineScript, use the $Using scope modifier.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示 inlinescript 工作流程變數，請使用 $Using 範圍修飾符。

trans-unit.source: The $Using scope modifier is required only once for each variable in the InlineScript.
trans-unit.target: $Using 範圍修飾符須有一次在 InlineScript 中每個變數。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows that the $Using scope modifier makes the value of the $a top-level workflow variable available to the commands in the InlineScript script block.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示，$Using 範圍修飾符設的值 $ 最上層工作流程變數的命令可以在 InlineScript 指令碼區塊。

trans-unit.source: workflow Test-Workflow { $a = 3
trans-unit.target: 工作流程測試工作流程 {$ = 3

trans-unit.source: Without $Using, the $a workflow variable is not visible in inline script.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 $Using，$工作流程變數則不顯示在內嵌指令碼。

trans-unit.source: InlineScript {"Inline A0 = $a"}
trans-unit.target: InlineScript {"內嵌 A0 = $"}

trans-unit.source: $Using imports the variable and its current value.
trans-unit.target: 使用 $ 匯入變數和目前的值。

trans-unit.source: InlineScript {"Inline A1 = $Using:a"} }
trans-unit.target: InlineScript {"內嵌 A1 = $Using:"}}

trans-unit.source: PS C:> Test-Workflow Inline A0 = Inline A1 = 3
trans-unit.target: PS C: > 測試工作流程內嵌 A0 = 內嵌 A1 = 3

trans-unit.source: InlineScript commands can change the value of the variable that was imported from workflow scope, but the changes are not visible in workflow scope.
trans-unit.target: InlineScript 可以變更從工作流程範圍匯入之變數的值，但在工作流程範圍中看不到該變更。

trans-unit.source: To make them visible, return the changed value to the workflow scope, as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓變更可見，請將變更的值傳回到工作流程範圍，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: workflow Test-Workflow { $a = 3
trans-unit.target: 工作流程測試工作流程 {$ = 3

trans-unit.source: Changes to the InlineScript variable value do not change the workflow variable.
trans-unit.target: InlineScript 變數值的變更不會變更工作流程變數。

trans-unit.source: InlineScript {$a = $using:a+1; "Inline A = $a"} "Workflow A = $a"
trans-unit.target: InlineScript {$ = $using: + 1。「 內嵌的 = $"}"的工作流程 = $"

trans-unit.source: To change the variable in workflow scope, return the new value.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更工作流程範圍中的變數，會傳回新值。

trans-unit.source: $a = InlineScript {$b = $Using:a+1; $b} "Workflow New A = $a" }
trans-unit.target: $ = InlineScript {$b = $Using: + 1; $b} 」 工作流程新增 A = $"}

trans-unit.source: PS C:> test-workflow Inline A = 4 Workflow A = 3 Workflow New A = 4
trans-unit.target: PS C: > 測試工作流程內嵌 A = 4 工作流程 A = 3 新增工作流程 A = 4

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting Note: A statement with the $Using scope modifier should appear before any use of the variable in the InlineScript script block.
trans-unit.target: 疑難排解附註︰ $Using 範圍修飾符的陳述式應該會出現任何使用 InlineScript 指令碼區塊中的變數之前。

trans-unit.source: RUNNING IN-PROCESS
trans-unit.target: 執行同處理序

trans-unit.source: To improve reliability, the commands in the InlineScript script block run in their own process, outside of the process in which the workflow runs, and then return their output to the workflow process.
trans-unit.target: 若要改善可靠性，InlineScript 指令碼區塊中的命令在自己的程序，在其中執行工作流程，在程序之外執行，然後其輸出傳回到工作流程處理。

trans-unit.source: To direct Windows PowerShell to run the InlineScript activity in the workflow process, remove the InlineScript value from the OutOfProcessActivity property of the session configuration, such as by using the New-PSWorkflowExecutionOption cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示 Windows PowerShell 工作流程處理序中執行 InlineScript 活動，將 InlineScript 值從 OutOfProcessActivity 屬性移除工作階段設定，例如使用 New-psworkflowexecutionoption 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "How to Run Windows PowerShell Commands in a Workflow" ( http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=261983).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 如何以執行 Windows PowerShell 命令在工作流程 」 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=261983)。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: The InlineScript in the following workflow includes commands that are not valid in workflows, including the use of the New-Object cmdlet with the ComObject parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下列工作流程中的 InlineScript 包含在工作流程，包括使用 New-object cmdlet 搭配 ComObject 參數中無效的命令。

trans-unit.source: workflow Test-Workflow { $ie = InlineScript { $ie = New-Object -ComObject InternetExplorer.Application -property @{navigate2="www.microsoft.com"}
trans-unit.target: 工作流程測試工作流程 {$ie = InlineScript {$ie = New-object-ComObject InternetExplorer.Application-屬性 @{navigate2 ="www.microsoft.com"}

trans-unit.source: $ie } $ie }
trans-unit.target: $ie} $ie}
